input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Pre-Lit Carolina Pine Garland"
Reference Product Description:
This Carolina Pine garland features mixed bristle and cashmere branch tips and is trimmed with pine cones. It is pre-strung with 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This indoor, outdoor garland can be displayed over doors, windows, fireplace mantels, fence or stairway railings.

Designed with a Norwood Fir branch base, this pre-lit artificial Christmas garland is 9 feet long and decorated with pine cones.
Features 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even when a bulb goes out. The lights are strung on before packaging, offering an easier, more convenient set up.
Suitable as an indoor or outdoor Christmas decoration, drape this garland over any door, window or entryway to add a festive feel to any area of the house.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials and hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this garland is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='National Tree Company Norwood Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Norwood Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='6 ft. Green Pre-Lit Artificial Grass Garland with 35 LED Lights'
  - Name='Puleo International 6 ft. x 9 in. Pre-Lit Magnolia Artificial Garland'
  - Name='Village Lighting Magnolia Leaf 9 ft. Pre-Lit LED Garland'
  - Name='50 ft Long Pre-Lit Christmas Garland Pathway Lights 400 5mm Warm White LED Lights Garland-Pathway'
  - Name='9' x 10" Decorated Christmas Garland with 180 Tips'
  - Name='36 in. x 26 in. Christmas Tree Arbor 4-Piece Set with LED Lights and Garland'
  - Name='Brite Star 10 Ft. Lighted Garland'
  - Name='HomPlanti 6' Frosted Artificial Christmas Garland with Pinecones and 50 Warm White LED Lights'
  - Name='Frontgate Holiday Collection 33056 6 Foot Trad Clear Pre-lit Christmas'
  - Name='Lexington Fir 9ft Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Garland'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 6 ft. Green Pre-Lit Artificial Grass Garland with 35 LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit garland but only 6 feet long and made of artificial grass, not fir or pine. Different silhouette and material, less relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International 6 ft. x 9 in. Pre-Lit Magnolia Artificial Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit and artificial garland but made from magnolia leaves and shorter length. Different branch type but similar decorative function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Village Lighting Magnolia Leaf 9 ft. Pre-Lit LED Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same length (9 ft), pre-lit, and artificial garland but made from magnolia leaves instead of pine/fir, so somewhat less similar silhouette but similar usage.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 50 ft Long Pre-Lit Christmas Garland Pathway Lights 400 5mm Warm White LED Lights Garland-Pathway
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Extremely long string of pre-lit lights for pathways, likely no pine branch material, so quite different in construction and use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 9' x 10" Decorated Christmas Garland with 180 Tips
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar size garland with decoration and numerous branch tips, presumably artificial fir/pine, reasonably relevant though no explicit mention of lighting.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 36 in. x 26 in. Christmas Tree Arbor 4-Piece Set with LED Lights and Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Not a garland but a tree arbor set; includes LED lights and garlands, but product type and use differ significantly from standalone garland.
10 ft lighted garland likely similar function and length close to 9 ft; however, details on materials or branch types are missing, so slightly less relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: HomPlanti 6' Frosted Artificial Christmas Garland with Pinecones and 50 Warm White LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit artificial garland with pinecones and similar decoration style but shorter length (6 ft) and descriptive detail about frosted tips; otherwise very similar.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Frontgate Holiday Collection 33056 6 Foot Trad Clear Pre-lit Christmas
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit Christmas garland with traditional style, shorter length (6 ft), but unclear branch type or decoration, moderate relevance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lexington Fir 9ft Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same 9 ft length, pre-lit artificial fir garland, similar core features and function, nearly identical product type from a different brand.
